rule_result.message: In TI/A the only valid pixel aspect ratio is 1:1 (square)
rule_result.ruleValue: In TI/A the only valid pixel aspect ratio is 1:1 (square)
rule_result.iso_reference: TI/A Draft v0.1: Section 4.2: Image data. Page 12

rule_result.message: PlanarConfiguration in Planar format is not currently in widespread use and it is not recommended for general interchange. It is used as an extension and Baseline TIFF readers are not required to support it.
rule_result.ruleValue: PlanarConfiguration in Planar format is not currently in widespread use and it is not recommended for general interchange. It is used as an extension and Baseline TIFF readers are not required to support it.

rule_result.message: XResolution tag must be greater than zero.
rule_result.ruleValue: XResolution tag must be greater than zero.
rule_result.iso_reference: TIFF Baseline 6: Section 8: Baseline Field Reference Guide. Page 41

rule_result.message: MaxSampleValue Tag is not defined. Then 2**(BitsPerSample) - 1 value is assumed
rule_result.ruleValue: MaxSampleValue Tag is not defined. Then 2**(BitsPerSample) - 1 value is assumed
rule_result.iso_reference: TIFF Baseline 6: Section 8: Baseline Field Reference Guide. Page 35

rule_result.message: MinSampleValue Tag is not defined. Then 0 value is assumed
rule_result.ruleValue: MinSampleValue Tag is not defined. Then 0 value is assumed
rule_result.iso_reference: TIFF Baseline 6: Section 8: Baseline Field Reference Guide. Page 35

rule_result.message: It is not mandatory that the image be actually displayed or printed at the size implied by XResolution. It is up to the application to use this information as it wishes.
